00072 REAL gMean_Min, gMean_Max, gSq_Min, gSq_Max, gVar_Min, gVar_Max;
00073 
00074 void WriteRangeFile(void)
00075 // images are already integral images.
00076 {
00077         CString filename;
00078         ofstream f;
00079 
00080         filename = gCascade_Filename + ".range";
00081         f.open(filename);
00082         gMean_Min = REAL(gSx*gSy*256); gSq_Min = REAL(gSx*gSy*256*256); gVar_Min = 256;
00083         gMean_Max = 0; gSq_Max = 0; gVar_Max = -256;
00084         for(int i=0;i<gFaceCount;i++)
00085         {
00086                 REAL ex, sq, v;
00087 
00088                 ex = sq = 0;
00089                 for(int j=1;j<gTrainSet[i].height;j++) 
00090                         for(int k=1;k<gTrainSet[i].width;k++)
00091                         {
00092                                 v = gTrainSet[i].data[j][k]+gTrainSet[i].data[j-1][k-1]-gTrainSet[i].data[j-1][k]-gTrainSet[i].data[j][k-1];
00093                                 sq += (v*v);
00094                         }
00095                 ex = gTrainSet[i].data[gSx][gSy];
00096                 gMean_Min = min(gMean_Min,ex);
00097                 gMean_Max = max(gMean_Max,ex);
00098                 gSq_Min = min(gSq_Min,sq);
00099                 gSq_Max = max(gSq_Max,sq);
00100                 gVar_Min = min(gVar_Min,gTrainSet[i].variance);
00101                 gVar_Max = max(gVar_Max,gTrainSet[i].variance);
00102         }
00103         gMean_Min *= REAL(0.90);
00104         gMean_Max *= REAL(1.10);
00105         gSq_Min *= REAL(0.90);
00106         gSq_Max *= REAL(1.10);
00107         gVar_Min *= REAL(0.90);
00108         gVar_Max *= REAL(1.10);
00109         f<<gMean_Min<<endl<<gMean_Max<<endl<<gSq_Min<<endl<<gSq_Max<<endl<<gVar_Min<<endl<<gVar_Max<<endl;
00110         f.close();
00111 }

00113 void ReadRangeFile(void)
00114 {
00115         CString filename;
00116         ifstream f;
00117 
00118         filename = gCascade_Filename + ".range";
00119         f.open(filename);
00120         f>>gMean_Min>>gMean_Max>>gSq_Min>>gSq_Max>>gVar_Min>>gVar_Max;
00121         f.close();
00122 }
00123 
00124 void ReadOneTrainingSample(ifstream& is,IntImage& image)
00125 {
00126         int i,j;
00127         char buf[256];
00128 
00129         ASSERT(gSx<=256 && gSy<=256);
00130         is>>image.label; is.ignore(256,'\n');
00131         ASSERT( (image.label == 0) || (image.label == 1) );
00132 
00133         is>>image.height>>image.width; is.ignore(256,'\n');
00134         ASSERT(image.height==gSx); 
00135         ASSERT(image.width==gSy);
00136 
00137         image.SetSize(CSize(image.height+1,image.width+1));
00138         for(i=0;i<image.height;i++) image.data[i][0] = 0;
00139         for(i=0;i<image.width;i++) image.data[0][i] = 0;
00140         for(i=1;i<image.height;i++)
00141         {
00142                 is.read(buf,image.width-1);
00143                 for(j=1;j<image.width;j++) 
00144                 {
00145                         image.data[i][j] = REAL(int(unsigned char(buf[j-1])));
00146                         ASSERT(image.data[i][j]>=0 && image.data[i][j] <= 255);
00147                 }
00148         }
00149         is.ignore(256,'\n');
00150 }
00151 
00152 void GetFeatureValues0(REAL* const features,const int from,const int to,const int x1,const int x2,const int x3,const int y1,const int y3)
00153 {
00154         int i;
00155         REAL f1;
00156         REAL** data;
00157 
00158         for(i=from;i<to;i++)
00159         {
00160                 data = gTrainSet[i].data;
00161                 f1 =   data[x1][y3] - data[x1][y1] + data[x3][y3] - data[x3][y1]
00162                          + 2*(data[x2][y1] - data[x2][y3]);
00163                 features[i] = f1 / gTrainSet[i].variance;
00164         }
00165 }
00166 
00167 void GetFeatureValues1(REAL* const features,const int from,const int to,const int x1,const int x3,const int y1,const int y2,const int y3)
00168 {
00169         int i;
00170         REAL f1;
00171         REAL** data;
00172 
00173         for(i=from;i<to;i++)
00174         {
00175                 data = gTrainSet[i].data;
00176                 f1 =   data[x3][y1] + data[x3][y3] - data[x1][y1] - data[x1][y3]
00177                          + 2*(data[x1][y2] - data[x3][y2]);
00178                 features[i] = f1 / gTrainSet[i].variance;
00179         }
00180 }
00181 
00182 void GetFeatureValues2(REAL* const features,const int from,const int to,const int x1,const int x2,const int x3,const int x4,const int y1,const int y3)
00183 {
00184         int i;
00185         REAL f1;
00186         REAL** data;
00187 
00188         for(i=from;i<to;i++)
00189         {
00190                 data = gTrainSet[i].data;
00191                 f1 =   data[x1][y1] -data[x1][y3] + data[x4][y3] - data[x4][y1]
00192                          + 3*(data[x2][y3] - data[x2][y1] + data[x3][y1] - data[x3][y3]);
00193                 features[i] = f1 / gTrainSet[i].variance;
00194         }
00195 }
00196 
00197 void GetFeatureValues3(REAL* const features,const int from,const int to,const int x1,const int x3,const int y1,const int y2,const int y3,const int y4)
00198 {
00199         int i;
00200         REAL f1;
00201         REAL** data;
00202 
00203         for(i=from;i<to;i++)
00204         {
00205                 data = gTrainSet[i].data;
00206                 f1 =   data[x1][y1] - data[x1][y4] + data[x3][y4] - data[x3][y1]
00207                          + 3*(data[x3][y2] - data[x3][y3] + data[x1][y3] - data[x1][y2] );
00208                 features[i] = f1 / gTrainSet[i].variance;
00209         }
00210 }
00211 
00212 void GetFeatureValues4(REAL* const features,const int from,const int to,const int x1,const int x2,const int x3,const int y1,const int y2,const int y3)
00213 {
00214         int i;
00215         REAL f1;
00216         REAL** data;
00217 
00218         for(i=from;i<to;i++)
00219         {
00220                 data = gTrainSet[i].data;
00221                 f1 =   data[x1][y1] + data[x1][y3] + data[x3][y1] + data[x3][y3]
00222                          - 2*(data[x2][y1] + data[x2][y3] + data[x1][y2] + data[x3][y2])
00223                          + 4*data[x2][y2];
00224                 features[i] = f1 / gTrainSet[i].variance;
00225         }
00226 }
00227 
00228 void QuickSort(REAL* values,int* labels,const int lo,const int hi)
00229 {
00230     int i=lo, j=hi;
00231         REAL v; int l;
00232     REAL x = values[(lo+hi)/2];
00233 
00234     do
00235     {    
00236         while (values[i]<x) i++; 
00237         while (values[j]>x) j--;
00238         if (i<=j)
00239         {
00240             v=values[i]; values[i]=values[j]; values[j]=v;
00241                         l=labels[i]; labels[i]=labels[j]; labels[j]=l;
00242             i++; j--;
00243         }
00244     } while (i<=j);
00245 
00246     if (lo<j) QuickSort(values,labels,lo, j);
00247     if (i<hi) QuickSort(values,labels,i, hi);
00248 }
00249 
00250 void QuickSort(REAL* values,int* labels,REAL* weights,int* parity,const int lo,const int hi)
00251 {
00252     int i=lo, j=hi;
00253         REAL v; int l; REAL w; int p;
00254     REAL x = values[(lo+hi)/2];
00255 
00256     do
00257     {    
00258         while (values[i]<x) i++; 
00259         while (values[j]>x) j--;
00260         if (i<=j)
00261         {
00262             v=values[i]; values[i]=values[j]; values[j]=v;
00263                         l=labels[i]; labels[i]=labels[j]; labels[j]=l;
00264                         w=weights[i];weights[i]=weights[j];weights[j]=w;
00265                         p=parity[i];parity[i]=parity[j];parity[j]=p;
00266             i++; j--;
00267         }
00268     } while (i<=j);
00269 
00270     if (lo<j) QuickSort(values,labels,weights,parity, lo, j);
00271     if (i<hi) QuickSort(values,labels,weights,parity, i, hi);
00272 }
00273 
00274 void FillTheTable(int* const row,const SimpleClassifier& sc)
00275 {
00276         int i;
00277         int x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4;
00278         
00279         x1 = sc.x1;     y1 = sc.y1;
00280         x2 = sc.x2;     y2 = sc.y2;
00281         x3 = sc.x3; y3 = sc.y3;
00282         x4 = sc.x4;     y4 = sc.y4;
00283         switch(sc.type)
00284         {
00285                 case 0:GetFeatureValues0(gFeatures,0,gTotalCount,x1,x2,x3,y1,y3);break;
00286                 case 1:GetFeatureValues1(gFeatures,0,gTotalCount,x1,x3,y1,y2,y3);break;
00287                 case 2:GetFeatureValues2(gFeatures,0,gTotalCount,x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y3);break;
00288                 case 3:GetFeatureValues3(gFeatures,0,gTotalCount,x1,x3,y1,y2,y3,y4);break;
00289                 case 4:GetFeatureValues4(gFeatures,0,gTotalCount,x1,x2,x3,y1,y2,y3);break;
00290         }
00291         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) row[i] = i;
00292         QuickSort(gFeatures,row,0,gTotalCount-1);
00293 }
00294 
00295 const int CountTrainFaces()
00296 {
00297         int i,count;
00298 
00299         count = 0;
00300         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00301                 count += gTrainSet[i].label;
00302         return count;
00303 }
00304 
00305 const int CountValidFaces()
00306 {
00307         int i,count;
00308 
00309         count = 0;
00310         for(i=0;i<gValidationCount;i++)
00311                 count += gValidationSet[i].label;
00312         return count;
00313 }
00314 
00315 void InitializeWeights()
00316 {
00317         int i;
00318 
00319         for(i=0;i<gFaceCount;i++) gWeights[i] = REAL(0.5)/gFaceCount;
00320         for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++) gWeights[i] = REAL(0.5)/(gTotalCount-gFaceCount);
00321 }

00323 void ReadClassifiers()
00324 {
00325         ifstream f;
00326         int i;
00327 
00328         f.open(gClassifier_Filename);
00329         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++) gClassifiers[i].ReadFromFile(f);
00330         f.close();
00331 }

00333 void IgnoreComments(ifstream& f)
00334 {
00335         f.ignore(65536,'\n');
00336 }

00339 {
00340         char buf[256];
00341         f.getline(buf,255,'\n');
00342         s = buf;

00345 void LoadOptions()
00346 {
00347         ifstream f;
00348         int i;
00349 
00350         f.open(gSetup_Filename);
00351         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gTrainset_Filename);
00352         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gValidationset_Filename);
00353         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gClassifier_Filename);
00354         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gAda_Log_Filename);
00355         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gCascade_Filename);
00356         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,FFS_WeakClassifiers_filename);
00357         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,FFS_log_filename);
00358         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,FileUsage_log_filename);
00359         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gBootstrap_Database_Filename);
00360         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gBackup_Directory_Name);
00361         IgnoreComments(f); ReadlnString(f,gTestSet_Filename);
00362 
00363         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gSx; IgnoreComments(f);
00364         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gSy; IgnoreComments(f);
00365         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gTrain_Method; IgnoreComments(f);
00366         IgnoreComments(f); f>>linear_classifier; IgnoreComments(f);
00367         IgnoreComments(f); f>>bootstrap_level; IgnoreComments(f);
00368         IgnoreComments(f); f>>max_bootstrap_level; IgnoreComments(f);
00369         bootstrap_resizeratio.resize(max_bootstrap_level);
00370         IgnoreComments(f); for(i=0;i<max_bootstrap_level;i++) f>>bootstrap_resizeratio[i]; IgnoreComments(f);
00371         bootstrap_increment.resize(max_bootstrap_level);
00372         IgnoreComments(f); for(i=0;i<max_bootstrap_level;i++) f>>bootstrap_increment[i]; IgnoreComments(f);
00373         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gTotalFeatures; IgnoreComments(f);
00374         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gMaxNumFiles; IgnoreComments(f);
00375         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gGoal_Method; IgnoreComments(f);
00376         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gNode_Det_Goal; IgnoreComments(f);
00377         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gNode_fp_Goal; IgnoreComments(f);
00378         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gFirst_Feature; IgnoreComments(f);
00379         IgnoreComments(f); f>>asym_ratio; IgnoreComments(f);
00380         IgnoreComments(f); f>>gMaxNumNodes; IgnoreComments(f);
00381         gNof.resize(gMaxNumNodes);
00382         IgnoreComments(f); for(i=0;i<gMaxNumNodes;i++) f>>gNof[i];      IgnoreComments(f);
00383         f.close();
00384 }
00385 
00386 void ReadTrainSet(CString filename)
00387 {
00388         ifstream f;
00389         int i;
00390 
00391         f.open(filename, ios_base::binary | ios_base::in);
00392         f>>gTotalCount; f.ignore(256,'\n');
00393         ASSERT(gTotalCount > 0);
00394         delete[] gTrainSet; gTrainSet=NULL;
00395         gTrainSet = new IntImage[gTotalCount]; ASSERT(gTrainSet != NULL);
00396         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) ReadOneTrainingSample(f,gTrainSet[i]);
00397         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) gTrainSet[i].CalculateVarianceAndIntegralImageInPlace();
00398         f.close();
00399         gFaceCount = CountTrainFaces();
00400 }
00401 
00402 void ReadValidSet(CString filename)
00403 {
00404         ifstream f;
00405         int i;
00406 
00407         f.open(filename, ios_base::binary | ios_base::in);
00408         f>>gValidationCount; f.ignore(256,'\n');
00409         ASSERT(gValidationCount > 0);
00410         delete[] gValidationSet; gValidationSet=NULL;
00411         gValidationSet = new IntImage[gValidationCount]; ASSERT(gValidationSet != NULL);
00412         for(i=0;i<gValidationCount;i++) ReadOneTrainingSample(f,gValidationSet[i]);
00413         for(i=0;i<gValidationCount;i++) gValidationSet[i].CalculateVarianceAndIntegralImageInPlace();
00414         f.close();
00415         gValidFaceCount = CountValidFaces();
00416 }

00418 void InitializeAuxiliaryVariables()
00419 {
00420         int i;
00421 
00422         ASSERT(gTrainSet != NULL);
00423         ASSERT(gTotalCount > 0);
00424 
00425         delete[] gWeights; gWeights = NULL;
00426         gWeights = new REAL[__max(gTotalCount,gValidationCount)]; ASSERT(gWeights != NULL);
00427         InitializeWeights();
00428 
00429         if(gTable!=NULL)
00430         {
00431                 for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00432                 {
00433                         delete[] gTable[i]; gTable[i] = NULL;
00434                 }
00435         }
00436         delete[] gTable; gTable = NULL;
00437         gTable = new int*[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(gTable != NULL);
00438         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00439         {
00440                 gTable[i] = new int[gTotalCount]; 
00441                 ASSERT(gTable[i] != NULL);
00442         }
00443 
00444         delete[] gFeatures; gFeatures = NULL;
00445         gFeatures = new REAL[__max(gTotalCount,gValidationCount)]; ASSERT(gFeatures != NULL);
00446 
00447         delete[] gLabels; gLabels = NULL;
00448         gLabels = new int[__max(gTotalCount,gValidationCount)]; ASSERT(gLabels!=NULL);
00449 }

00451 void SaveTrainSet(CString filename)
00452 {
00453         ofstream f;
00454         int i;
00455 
00456         f.open(filename,ios_base::out | ios_base::binary);
00457         f<<gTotalCount<<endl;
00458         unsigned char writebuf[24*24];
00459         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00460         {
00461                 int k,t;
00462                 f<<gTrainSet[i].label<<endl;
00463                 f<<gSx<<" "<<gSy<<endl;
00464                 for(k=0;k<gSx;k++)
00465                         for(t=0;t<gSy;t++)
00466                                 writebuf[k*gSx+t] = (unsigned char)((int)(gTrainSet[i].data[k+1][t+1]-gTrainSet[i].data[k][t+1]-gTrainSet[i].data[k+1][t]+gTrainSet[i].data[k][t]));
00467                 f.write((char*)writebuf,gSx*gSy);
00468                 f<<endl;
00469         }
00470         f.close();
00471 }

00489                 f.write((char*)writebuf,gSx*gSy);

00495 void ReadBootstrapFileNames()
00496 {
00497         ifstream f;
00498         int i;
00499 
00500         f.open(gBootstrap_Database_Filename);
00501         f>>gBootstrapSize; IgnoreComments(f);
00502         gBootstrap_Filenames = new CString[gBootstrapSize]; ASSERT(gBootstrap_Filenames!=NULL);
00503         for(i=0;i<gBootstrapSize;i++) ReadlnString(f,gBootstrap_Filenames[i]);

00507 void InitGlobalData()
00508 {
00509         int i;
00510 
00511         srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
00512         LoadOptions();
00513         ReadTrainSet(gTrainset_Filename);
00514         ReadValidSet(gValidationset_Filename);
00515         InitializeAuxiliaryVariables();
00516         ReadBootstrapFileNames();
00517 
00518         gCascade = new CascadeClassifier;
00519         ASSERT(gCascade != NULL);
00520         gCascade->LoadDefaultCascade();
00521         gStartingNode = gCascade->count+1;
00522 
00523         gClassifiers = new SimpleClassifier[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(gClassifiers != NULL);
00524         ReadClassifiers();
00525 
00526         gFileUsed = new int[gMaxNumFiles]; ASSERT(gFileUsed != NULL);
00527         for(i=0;i<gMaxNumFiles;i++) gFileUsed[i] = 0;
00528 
00529         ReadRangeFile();
00530 }
00531 
00532 void ClearUpGlobalData()
00533 {
00534         int i;
00535 
00536         gSetup_Filename.Empty();
00537         gTrainset_Filename.Empty();
00538         gValidationset_Filename.Empty();
00539         gClassifier_Filename.Empty();
00540         gAda_Log_Filename.Empty();
00541         gCascade_Filename.Empty();
00542         FFS_WeakClassifiers_filename.Empty();
00543         FFS_log_filename = "rate_FFS.txt";
00544         FileUsage_log_filename.Empty();
00545         gBootstrap_Database_Filename.Empty();
00546         gBackup_Directory_Name.Empty();
00547         gTestSet_Filename.Empty();
00548         gSx = gSy = 0;
00549         gTrain_Method = 0;
00550         linear_classifier = 0;
00551         bootstrap_level = 0;
00552         max_bootstrap_level = 0;
00553         bootstrap_resizeratio.clear();
00554         bootstrap_increment.clear();
00555         gFirst_Feature = 0;
00556         gMaxNumFiles = 0;
00557         gGoal_Method = 0;
00558         gNode_Det_Goal = 0.0;
00559         gNode_fp_Goal = 0.0;
00560         asym_ratio = 0.0;
00561         gMaxNumNodes = 0; 
00562         gNof.clear();
00563 
00564         delete[] gTrainSet;     gTrainSet = NULL;
00565         delete[] gValidationSet;  gValidationSet = NULL;
00566         gTotalCount = gValidationCount = 0;
00567 
00568         delete gCascade; gCascade = NULL;
00569 
00570         delete[] gWeights; gWeights = NULL;
00571         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00572         {
00573                 delete[] gTable[i];     gTable[i] = NULL;
00574         }
00575         gTotalFeatures = 0;
00576         delete[] gTable;        gTable = NULL;
00577         delete[] gClassifiers; gClassifiers = NULL;
00578 
00579         delete[] gFeatures; gFeatures = NULL;
00580         delete[] gLabels; gLabels = NULL;
00581 
00582         delete[] gFileUsed; gFileUsed = NULL;
00583 
00584         gBootstrapSize = 0;
00585         delete[] gBootstrap_Filenames; gBootstrap_Filenames = NULL;
00586 }
00587 
00588 void SkewWeight(const REAL skew_ratio)
00589 {
00590         int i;
00591 
00592         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00593                 if(gTrainSet[i].label==1)
00594                         gWeights[i] *= skew_ratio;
00595 
00596         NormalizeWeight();
00597 }
00598 
00599 void NormalizeWeight()
00600 {
00601         REAL sum;
00602         int i;
00603 
00604         sum = 0.0;
00605         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) sum += gWeights[i];
00606         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) gWeights[i] /= sum;
00607 //      for(i=0;i<totalcount;i++) if(weights[i]<1e-8) weights[i] = 1e-8;
00608 }
00609 
00610 void ValidateTheThreshold(AdaBoostClassifier& ada,ofstream& f)
00611 {
00612         int i,j;
00613         int falsepos,falseneg;
00614 
00615         for(i=0;i<gValidFaceCount;i++) gFeatures[i] = 0.0;
00616         for(i=0;i<gValidFaceCount;i++)
00617                 for(j=0;j<ada.count;j++) 
00618                         if(ada.scs[j].Apply(gValidationSet[i])!=0)
00619                                 gFeatures[i] += ada.alphas[j];
00620         nth_element(gFeatures,gFeatures+int(gValidFaceCount*(1-gNode_Det_Goal)),gFeatures+gValidFaceCount);
00621         ada.thresh = gFeatures[int(gValidFaceCount*(1-gNode_Det_Goal))];
00622 
00623         falseneg = gFaceCount;
00624         for(i=0;i<gFaceCount;i++) falseneg -= ada.ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i]);
00625         falsepos = 0;
00626         for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++) falsepos += ada.ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i]);
00627         f<<"-----Use the validation set to determine a threshold ------"<<endl;
00628         f<<ada.thresh<<"\t"<<falseneg<<"\t"<<falsepos<<endl;
00629 }
00630 
00631 // Matrix inversion code, revised from Numerical recipe in C, and the graphviz Documentation
00632 int lu_decompose(REAL** a,int n,REAL** lu,int* ps)
00633 {
00634         int i,j,k;
00635         int pivotindex=0;
00636         REAL pivot,biggest,mult,tempf;
00637         REAL* scales;
00638 
00639         scales = new REAL[n]; ASSERT(scales!=NULL);
00640         for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
00641                 biggest=0.0;
00642                 for(j=0;j<n;j++)
00643                         if(biggest<(tempf=fabs(lu[i][j]=a[j][i])))
00644                                 biggest=tempf;
00645                 if(biggest!=0.0)
00646                         scales[i] = REAL(1.0)/biggest;
00647                 else {
00648                         scales[i]=0.0;
00649                         delete[] scales; scales=NULL;
00650                         return 0; //zero row: singular matrix
00651                 }
00652                 ps[i]=i;
00653         }
00654 
00655         for(k=0;k<n-1;k++) {
00656                 biggest=0.0;
00657                 for(i=k;i<n;i++)
00658                         if(biggest<(tempf=fabs(lu[ps[i]][k])*scales[ps[i]])) {
00659                                 biggest=tempf;
00660                                 pivotindex=i;
00661                         }
00662                 if(biggest==0.0)
00663                 {
00664                         delete[] scales; scales=NULL;
00665                         return 0; //zero row: singular matrix
00666                 }
00667                 if(pivotindex!=k) {
00668                         j=ps[k];
00669                         ps[k] = ps[pivotindex];
00670                         ps[pivotindex]=j;
00671                 }
00672 
00673                 pivot=lu[ps[k]][k];
00674                 for(i=k+1;i<n;i++) {
00675                         lu[ps[i]][k]=mult=lu[ps[i]][k]/pivot;
00676                         if(mult!=0.0) {
00677                                 for(j=k+1;j<n;j++)
00678                                         lu[ps[i]][j] -= mult*lu[ps[k]][j];
00679                         }
00680                 }
00681         }
00682         if(lu[ps[n-1]][n-1]==0.0)
00683         {
00684                 delete[] scales; scales=NULL;
00685                 return 0; // signular matrix
00686         }
00687 
00688         delete[] scales; scales=NULL;
00689         return 1;
00690 }
00691 
00692 void lu_solve(REAL* x,REAL* b,int n,REAL** lu,int* ps)
00693 {
00694         int i,j;
00695         REAL dot;
00696 
00697         for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
00698                 dot=0.0;
00699                 for(j=0;j<i;j++)
00700                         dot+=lu[ps[i]][j]*x[j];
00701                 x[i]=b[ps[i]]-dot;
00702         }
00703 
00704         for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--) {
00705                 dot=0.0;
00706                 for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
00707                         dot+=lu[ps[i]][j]*x[j];
00708                 x[i]=(x[i]-dot)/lu[ps[i]][i];
00709         }
00710 }
00711 
00712 void MatrixInversion(REAL** a,int n)
00713 {
00714         REAL** lu;
00715         int i,j;
00716         REAL* col;
00717         int* ps;
00718 
00719         lu = new REAL*[n]; ASSERT(lu!=NULL);
00720         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
00721         {
00722                 lu[i] = new REAL[n];
00723                 ASSERT(lu[i]!=NULL);
00724         }
00725         ps = new int[n]; ASSERT(ps!=NULL);
00726         if(lu_decompose(a,n,lu,ps)==0)
00727                 AfxMessageBox("Singular Matrix 3!");
00728         col = new REAL[n]; ASSERT(col!=NULL);
00729         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
00730         {
00731                 for(j=0;j<n;j++) col[j]=0.0;
00732                 col[i]=1.0;
00733                 lu_solve(a[i],col,n,lu,ps);
00734         }
00735         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
00736                 for(j=0;j<n;j++)
00737                 {
00738                         REAL temp;
00739                         temp=a[i][j];
00740                         a[i][j]=a[j][i];
00741                         a[j][i]=temp;
00742                 }
00743         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
00744         {
00745                 delete[] lu[i];
00746                 lu[i]=NULL;
00747         }
00748         delete[] lu; lu=NULL;
00749         delete[] ps; ps=NULL;
00750         delete[] col; col=NULL;
00751 }
00752 // Matrix inversion code finished.
00753 
00754 void WithinClassScatter(AdaBoostClassifier& ada)
00755 {
00756         int i,j,k;
00757         REAL* mean1;
00758         REAL* mean2;
00759         REAL** cov;
00760         REAL** table;
00761 
00762         table = new REAL*[ada.count]; ASSERT(table!=NULL);
00763         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++) 
00764         {
00765                 table[i] = new REAL[gTotalCount]; ASSERT(table[i] != NULL);
00766         }
00767         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00768                 for(j=0;j<gTotalCount;j++)
00769                         table[i][j] = REAL(ada.scs[i].Apply(gTrainSet[j]));
00770 
00771         cov = new REAL*[ada.count]; ASSERT(cov!=NULL);
00772         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00773         {
00774                 cov[i] = new REAL[ada.count]; ASSERT(cov[i]!=NULL);
00775         }
00776         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00777                 for(j=0;j<ada.count;j++)
00778                         cov[i][j]=0.0;
00779 
00780         mean1 = new REAL[ada.count]; ASSERT(mean1!=NULL);
00781         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++) mean1[i] = 0;
00782         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00783                 for(j=0;j<gFaceCount;j++)
00784                         mean1[i] += table[i][j];
00785         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++) mean1[i] /= gFaceCount;
00786         for(i=0;i<gFaceCount;i++)
00787                 for(j=0;j<ada.count;j++)
00788                         for(k=0;k<ada.count;k++)
00789                                 cov[j][k] += (table[j][i]-mean1[j])*(table[k][i]-mean1[k]);
00790 
00791         mean2 = new REAL[ada.count]; ASSERT(mean2!=NULL);
00792         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++) mean2[i] = 0;
00793         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00794                 for(j=gFaceCount;j<gTotalCount;j++)
00795                         mean2[i] += table[i][j];
00796         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++) mean2[i] /= (gTotalCount-gFaceCount);
00797 
00798         if(linear_classifier==LC_FDA)
00799         {
00800                 for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00801                         for(j=0;j<ada.count;j++)
00802                                 for(k=0;k<ada.count;k++)
00803                                         cov[j][k] += (table[j][i]-mean2[j])*(table[k][i]-mean2[k]);
00804         }
00805         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++) cov[i][i] += REAL(0.1);
00806 
00807         MatrixInversion(cov,ada.count);
00808 
00809         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++) ada.alphas[i]=0.0;
00810         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00811                 for(j=0;j<ada.count;j++)
00812                         ada.alphas[i] += cov[i][j]*(mean1[j]-mean2[j]);
00813 
00814         delete[] mean1; mean1=NULL;
00815         delete[] mean2; mean2=NULL;
00816         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00817         {
00818                 delete[] cov[i]; cov[i]=NULL;
00819         }
00820         delete[] cov; cov=NULL;
00821         for(i=0;i<ada.count;i++)
00822         {
00823                 delete[] table[i]; table[i]=NULL;
00824         }
00825         delete[] table; table=NULL;
00826 }
